text: Julia Roberts and her longtime hairstylist and friend Serge Normant break down some of her most iconic hairstyles over the years, from the ’90s to the ’00s to today. The pair talk about Julia’s iconic look from the 2001 Academy Awards when she won best actress for Erin Brockovich to the 2016 Cannes Film Festival […]
